hymn.title: I Wanna Be Good Ground
hymn.category: Various Aspects of the Inner Life—Dealing with the Heart

layout.singingstanza: I wan -- na be good ground! I wan -- na be good ground! I wan -- na be good ground, so God's Word can grow in me! I'm gon -- na break up that hard ground, I'm gon -- na dig up those rocks, Lord, I'm gon -- na pull out those thorns so God's Word can grow in me!
layout.sheetcopyright: www.hymnal.net; © 2006 Bible StorySongs, Inc. Used by permission.

lyrics.stanza: I wanna be good ground! I wanna be good ground! I wanna be good ground, So God's Word can grow in me!
I'm gonna break up that hard ground, I'm gonna dig up those rocks, Lord, I'm gonna pull out those thorns So God's Word can grow in me!
